      • reduceUntilRespectSize

        public static java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream reduceUntilRespectSize(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                                   int size,
                                                   int quality)
        Reduces the size of the given bitmap
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap to be reduced
        size - the size of the new bitmap
        quality - the quality of the compression of the bitmap, from 1 (low quality) to 100 (high quality)
        Returns:
        the byte stream of the reduced bitmap

      • getBitmapFromFile

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapFromFile(java.io.File image)
        Gets a bitmap from the given file, if possible
        Parameters:
        image - the file that has to be converted to a bitmap
        Returns:
        the bitmap generated from the file, or null if the file is not convertible to a bitmap

        selectedImage - the Uri of the image
        Returns:

      • calculateInSampleSize

        public static int calculateInSampleSize(android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options options,
                        int reqWidth,
                        int reqHeight)
        Calculate the "inSampleSize" value of a bitmap, using the given width and height
        Parameters:
        options - the options of the bitmap
        reqWidth - pixels required for the width of image
        reqHeight - pixels required for the height of image
        Returns:
        the "inSampleSize" value of the bitmap
